channel.title: ~1.0.X release tiny changes suggestion
channel.description:
After playing game a lot and analysing it I'd like to share my thoughts how to improve gameplay experience by just **tiny changes**.
## Court Wizard Barrier is quite useless and playing this class definitely isn't much fun. And magic should be awesome! **- whenever he casts a barrier on somebody, he casts it on himself as well** **- let him ice ward himself**
## Drunk Drunk gets in way of people. Mostly just blocking Blue Dragon members, as evil/neutral roles are often occupy immune. He gets decent amount of information, but dies easiely and quickly, not providing much value. **- add day ability like alchemist Stoneskin Potion with 1 charge, it can be named "Drunk Man's Luck"**
## Physician -> Apothecary/Barber Surgeon or Psychic -> Telepath Name physician is confused by a lot of players with psychic. It produces in game unneccessary chaos. **- rename Physician to Apothecary/Barber Surgeon** OR **- rename Psychic to Telepath**
## Noble Some people will say Noble is awesome role, as he can hear whispers etc. I do not agree. People often whisper just 1 sentence (very often it's not even associated with game). Evils almost never whisper each other. In more than half of games people ain't whispering at all till some mid-lategame, when noble is usualy already dead or confirmed (and he can whisper for any information he needs, instead spying). I think he needs little improvement to be more fun-to-play.
But there is also second matter. In ToS removing spy ability to whisper made a game much better. Evils allowed to whisper come up with better strategies, communicate with each other and game is more alive.
**- remove his ability "maid spy" (aristocrat can still have "maid spy")** **- make him talk with king every night (they won't know numbers), so that noble will kind of "control" kings behavior**
## Summary Above changes should improve quality of game by a decent amount, while remaining very easy to implement. Their impact on balance should be negligible.
